alert.note: Alert for Coastal Martin; Coastal St. Lucie; Inland Indian River (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Watch issued June 04 at 9:16AM EDT until further notice by NWS Melbourne
info.description: .Heavy rain associated with Potential Tropical Cyclone One will spread across South FL through today, with a focus for highest rainfall totals along the Treasure Coast. This will produce minor flooding of low and urban areas. ...FLOOD WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 PM EDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall continues to be possible. * WHERE...A portion of east central Florida, including the following areas, Coastal Indian River, Coastal Martin, Coastal Saint Lucie, Inland Indian River, Inland Martin and Inland Saint Lucie. * WHEN...Until 8 PM EDT this evening. * IMPACTS...Excessive runoff may result in flooding of rivers, creeks, streams, and other low-lying and flood-prone locations. Flooding may occur in poor drainage and urban areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: You should monitor later forecasts and be alert for possible Flood Warnings. Those living in areas prone to flooding should be prepared to take action should flooding develop.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Martin; Coastal St. Lucie; Inland Indian River
